title: Reexamining gender inequality in accessing resources and education stance in reducing masculine gender hegemony in Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Olajumoke O. Alabi, Mmaduabuchukwu C. Mkpado, Abiodun O. Ajala, Chika A. Ifejirika, Arinze Ngwube, Ken Amaechi Egbo, Sunday C. Aniobi, Ndidiamaka S. Mkpado, Chika Mmaduakor, Tanko P. Sani, Sunday I. Ogunjimi, Olayiwola Fasoranti, Saifullahi Idris
